summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List, and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Office of the Director of National Intelligence outlines 15 open recommendations that it should prioritize. These recommendations are intended to address management issues related to business functions and systems, facilities, workforce, and personnel vetting...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Office of the Director of National Intelligence
